parameters.example: >       _$AdsResponseFromJson(json);    Map<String, dynamic> toJson() => _$AdsResponseToJson(this); }  @JsonSerializable() class AdData {   final int? id;   final String? title;   final String? status;   @JsonKey(name: "banner_type")   final String? bannerType;   @JsonKey(name: "banner_location")   final String? bannerLocation;   @JsonKey(name: "target_url")   final String? targetUrl;   @JsonKey(name: "starts_at")   final String? startsAt;   @JsonKey(name: "ends_at")   final String? endsAt;   @JsonKey(name: "budget_type")   final String? budgetType;   @JsonKey(name: "budget_amount")   final String? budgetAmount;   @JsonKey(name: "spent_amount")   final String? spentAmount;   @JsonKey(name: "target_keywords")   final List<String>? targetKeywords;   @JsonKey(name: "target_id")   final int? targetId;   @JsonKey(name: "target_type")   final String? targetType;   @JsonKey(name: "created_at")   final String? createdAt;   @JsonKey(name: "updated_at")   final String? updatedAt;   final double? ctr;   @JsonKey(name: "daily_budget")   final double? dailyBudget;   @JsonKey(name: "days_remaining")   final double? daysRemaining;   @JsonKey(name: "is_active")   final bool? isActive;   @JsonKey(name: "remaining_budget")   final double? remainingBudget;   final int? clicks;   final int? impressions;   final List<Media>? media;    AdData({     this.id,     this.title,     this.status,     this.bannerType,     this.bannerLocation,     this.targetUrl,     this.startsAt,     this.endsAt,     this.budgetType,     this.budgetAmount,     this.spentAmount,     this.targetKeywords,     this.targetId,     this.targetType,     this.createdAt,     this.updatedAt,     this.ctr,     this.dailyBudget,     this.daysRemaining,     this.isActive,     this.remainingBudget,     this.clicks,     this.impressions,     this.media,   });    factory AdData.fromJson(Map<String, dynamic> json) => _$AdDataFromJson(json);   Map<String, dynamic> toJson() => _$AdDataToJson(this); }  @JsonSerializable() class Media {   final int? id;   @JsonKey(name: "file_name")   final String? fileName;   final String? size;   @JsonKey(name: "human_readable_size")   final String? humanReadableSize;   final String? url;   final String? type;    Media({     this.id,     this.fileName,     this.size,     this.humanReadableSize,     this.url,     this.type,   });    factory Media.fromJson(Map<String, dynamic> json) => _$MediaFromJson(json);   Map<String, dynamic> toJson() => _$MediaToJson(this); }  @JsonSerializable() class Links {   final String? first;   final String? last;   final String? prev;   final String? next;    Links({this.first, this.last, this.prev, this.next});    factory Links.fromJson(Map<String, dynamic> json) => _$LinksFromJson(json);   Map<String, dynamic> toJson() => _$LinksToJson(this); }  @JsonSerializable() class Meta {   @JsonKey(name: "current_page")   final int? currentPage;   final int? from;   @JsonKey(name: "last_page")   final int? lastPage;   final List<MetaLink>? links;   final String? path;   @JsonKey(name: "per_page")   final int? perPage;   final int? to;   final int? total;    Meta({     this.currentPage,     this.from,     this.lastPage,     this.links,     this.path,     this.perPage,     this.to,     this.total,   });    factory Meta.fromJson(Map<String, dynamic> json) => _$MetaFromJson(json);   Map<String, dynamic> toJson() => _$MetaToJson(this); }  @JsonSerializable() class MetaLink {   final String? url;   final String? label;   final bool? active;    MetaLink({this.url, this.label, this.active});    factory MetaLink.fromJson(Map<String, dynamic> json) =>       _$MetaLinkFromJson(json);   Map<String, dynamic> toJson() => _$MetaLinkToJson(this); }

parameters.example: query MyQuery {  topProducts(endDate: "2026-01-01", startDate: "2025-01-01", limit: 10) {    productId    productImage    productName    totalAddedToCart    totalClicks    totalFavorites    totalOrderPaid    totalOrdersCreated    totalRevenue    totalViews  }  orderAnalyticsSummary(endDate: "2026-01-01", startDate: "2025-01-01") {    averageOrderValue    ordersByDate {      count      date      totalAmount    }    paymentStatus {      cancelled      completed      expired      failed      pending      processing      refunded    }    revenueTrend {      count      date      totalAmount    }    totalOrders    totalRevenue  }  productAnalyticsSummary(endDate: "2026-01-01", startDate: "2025-01-01") {    totalAddedToCart    totalClick    totalFavorites    totalOrderPaid    totalOrdersCreated    totalRevenue    totalViews  }}
